content: Launchpads offer an extra layer of security in an industry that has been marred by scams and rug pulls, as they handpick each project and put them through stringent vetting processes before they promote themA cryptocurrency launchpad is a platform where investors can find the newest and most promising DeFi projects. Launchpads offer an extra layer of security in an industry that has been marred by scams and rug pulls, as they handpick each project and put them through stringent vetting processes before they promote them.Â As most crypto enthusiasts know, the best way to earn exponential returns on your money is to invest as early as possible in a cryptocurrency. For example, Shiba Inu rocketed more than 18,000% since its inception, and the buyers who got in early would have reaped the most significant returns. Learn more on how AdLunam is vetting high quality projects for their launchpad: adlunam.cc
